comments.body: Please add some test commands. It would be good if you test the shared library compiled

There are binaries in `$PREFIX/bin` that could be tested as well thought at least one of them looks like it shouldn't be included in the package (`$PREFIX/bin/installcheck`).
```suggestion
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib64/libsolv.so.1  # [unix]
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib64/libsolvext.so.1  # [unix]
```
It also might make more sense to install these in `$PREFIX/lib` rather than `$PREFIX/lib64`.
